DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study determine feasibility optimize IMRT treatment plan base dosimeter measurement mucosal radiation dose adjacent dental filling reduce dose < 35 Gy without compromise tumor coverage and/or increase dose remain oral cavity nearby parotid gland .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility IMRT Modulation Account Scattered Radiation From Dental Fillings Head Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients HNC undergo radiation therapy +/ chemotherapy Stanford University At least 18 year old Metallic filling present Planned radiation dose tumor > 60 Gy 1.8 2.2 Gy/fx Able understand sign write informed consent document . Pregnant Nursing
